listing.listing_description:
This spectacular home on Koh Samui is situated in a quiet enclave along the east coast near Bophut and Chaweng. Perched on elevated land about five kilometers from the beach, the villa gazes out on panoramic views of Chaweng Bay. Its superb architectural design features tiered terraces cascading down the lush hillside, including a split-level infinity swimming pool fused by a central waterfall. Outstanding features include gourmet kitchens both indoors and alfresco, as well as a talented staff with private chef. Six bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to twelve in size.

The villa's upper terrace extends from the main great room, forming a fabulous, indoor/outdoor space for relaxation and entertainment. The voluminous infinity pool includes a shallow area for children, and wraps around a lovely sunken lounge. The shaded veranda includes a beautiful alfresco dining table with seating for ten, and there is a large kitchen to the side of the pool, featuring a built-in barbecue and wet bar. The lower pool is perched between two of the bedroom suites, with lounge chairs for tranquil hours in the sun. Lovely lighting invites you to linger outdoors deep into the night.

The great room opens wide to the upper terrace, as well as the garden patio by the front entrance—creating a lovely crosscurrent of sea-kissed air. The open-concept space features a comfortable lounge, a beautiful dining table for twelve, and a sleek modern kitchen with chef-grade appliances and breakfast bar. The harmonious design balances contemporary lines, gallery-worthy artwork, traditional Thai objects, and natural wood accents.

Each of the bedrooms features a sumptuous king bed and an ensuite bathroom—three of which include alfresco bathtubs. All of the rooms open to furnished balconies or terraces, and several of the rooms include private lounge areas.

The villa's lofty location balances exquisite privacy and seclusion with convenient access to some of the finest beaches, golf, and nightlife spots on Koh Samui. You're about five kilometers from three famous beaches—Chaweng, Chawent Noh, and Bophut—as well as Chaweng Town and Fisherman's Village. The international Airport is just over six kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A living art installation for fans of fantasy and romance awaits at Iniala Collector’s Villa. A team of leading designers have created a series of whimsical spaces housed in a contemporary twist on a classic Thai house. Situated on the golden sands of Natai Beach near Phuket, with wonderful sunset views over the Andaman Sea, from golden teak to beautiful tiling, this enticing creation represents a sublime deviation from the normal.

The masterful design and decor will leave you speechless. The villa evokes the feeling of being on the set of a palace set in a futuristic sci-fi film. The ceramic temple of Wat Arun inspires the sea blue living room, its walls encrusted with 3,000 ceramic plates. The spectacular cinema is filled with fabulous furry green Cipria sofas and complete with surround sound and a wonderful 160-inch screen. The Pearl Spa is covered in mother of pearl, with gold and bronze furniture creating a shimmering sanctuary. The formal dining room sits cool and encased in glass, hovering over the edge of the infinity swimming pool.

This villa provides a dedicated staff with a driver, butler, chef, spa therapist and housekeeper. Allow Iniala Collector Villa’s ace chef to take you on a journey of culinary wonder, preparing meals to your tastes. Enjoy a massage that will take you deep into a Zen-like state. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

The bedrooms within the Iniala Collector’s Villa are each as individual as their designers. Jaime Hayon from Spain has created a bright beach suite, with imaginative details such as the ‘clown’ door. From Ireland’s Joseph Walsh, a symphony of ash wood and stone showcase a bed frame of layered, arched woods akin to a princess’ sleeping chamber. Finally, the sensual boudoir from New Zealand’s Mark Brazier-Jones provides an interior awash with silks, crystal and metal.

Iniala Collector’s Villa is a private vacation rental leaving little to be desired. Far from the general hubs of Phuket, this oceanfront villa permits rejuvenation in a setting that stimulates all five of your known senses. You will nonetheless be within easy driving distance of a number of attractions and activities including the Wat Chalong Temple, Phuket Town and golf at Blue Canyon. Bring the family or organize a wedding… or have it all to yourself for a decadent honeymoon. Have your vacation, your way!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover a contemporary twist on Thai style—and a fresh take on the luxury beach resort—at Iniala Penthouse Suite. From the unique curving roofline and sleek terrace facing the Andaman Sea to unique artwork and custom furnishings, this one-bedroom Phuket vacation rental is unlike any place you’ve stayed before. Whether you’re visiting the Iniala Beach House complex for a family occasion or escaping on your honeymoon, let the villa’s full staff cater to your every need during your stay.

An infinity pool runs through the penthouse, ending in the middle of a terrace with al-fresco lounging and dining areas and beckoning you outside. After a swim in the pool or the ocean just steps away, rinse off in the outdoor shower. Meals are included in your stay, so ask your chef to surprise you with something from the barbecue or celebrate with a favorite dish that brings back fond memories. A driver and butler are also on hand, and—in case you need help relaxing—a spa therapist is available to provide treatments in the villa’s private spa and massage room.

The sculptural interiors of Iniala Penthouse Suite, custom designed by Graham Lamb, feel almost like an extension of the landscape. Glass walls on the oceanfront side of the villa flood the space with sunlight and sea views, and large doors can be opened to let in the warm breezes off the water. Circular sofas are set into soft, sand-toned carpet so that walking across the room feels like strolling across the beach, and even accents like an onyx table and round poufs have the look of stones polished by the waves. Take a seat at the breakfast bar to enjoy a meal prepared by your chef, or use the fully equipped kitchen for your own culinary endeavors.

The villa’s single bedroom can be opened to the terrace or closed off behind floor-length drapes for a more intimate space. There are two king beds, one of which is rendered in white leather and dramatically suspended for a cocoon-like feel. Not only does the bedroom have an en-suite bathroom, but an infinity-edge hot tub and round, glassed-in shower are actually set into the plush carpet, just like the sofas in the living room.

Your holiday at Iniala Penthouse Suite begins with a transfer from Phuket International Airport, 31 km away. Once you’ve arrived at the villa, you’re just steps away from Natai Beach and a short drive from Mai Khao Beach, Nai Thon Beach and Surin Beach. If you’d like to see more of Thailand during your stay, take advantage of the photo ops on Sa Phan Sarasin bridge, explore Sirinat National Park, glimpse the local culture with a show at FantaSea or roam downtown Phuket. Search for the perfect souvenir at Central Festival Shopping Center and enjoy a blissful moment of peace at Wat Chalong Temple before braving the famously lively nightlife of Patong.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Host a once-in-a-lifetime family reunion or unforgettable destination wedding in Thailand at the spectacular Miskawaan Estate. With eight beautiful villas, accommodations for up to seventy-two guests, a full staff, a range of amenities and a location just steps from low-key Maenam Beach, this oceanfront Koh Samui vacation rental is like a luxury resort that you can have to yourselves.

Your holiday at the estate includes the services of a private chef, butler, housekeeper, concierge and villa manager, as well as an airport transfer, full breakfast and one in-villa massage per adult guest. The estate features several saltwater pools, stretching along 200 meters of beach, outdoor living and dining areas, snorkeling equipment and beach umbrellas. There’s also a games room, fitness room, media room, satellite television and complimentary Wi-Fi.

The eight villas at Miskawaan Estate are an expert pairing of traditional Thai architecture and sleek contemporary style. Open-concept living and dining areas with high ceilings have a breezy feel, and plenty of sliding glass doors let you move seamlessly from indoors to out. Though the villas do have kitchens, the chef will be happy to prepare your selection from the in-villa menu.

The estate has five villas with five bedrooms each, one four-bedroom villa and two three-bedroom villas, for a total of thirty-five bedrooms. All of the bedrooms are air conditioned, and all but two have en-suite bathrooms. The choice of accommodations ranges from double beds to twin beds, depending on the room.

Spend your days reliving your honeymoon with strolls on the sand, napping on the beach or snorkeling just off shore. The estate is only steps from sandy, relaxed Maenam Beach, a backpacker favorite that’s now popular with couples and families for its casual feel and picture-perfect views. Find tennis and golf, along with exercise facilities, 5 minutes away at Santiburi.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.

The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.

The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.

This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.

Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Vacation like a star at Iniala Villa Siam, a luxury Phuket vacation rental unlike any other. Filled with incredible pieces of Thai art and design, this breathtaking contemporary property stirs both spirit and senses with its unique architecture and thoughtful amenities. A full staff and three suite-style bedrooms make this an intimate beachfront retreat for a family or small group of friends.

Your holiday at Iniala Villa Siam includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, driver, butler and spa therapist, so indulge in local specialties from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, drinks by the infinity pool or a treatment in the massage room. In between, you can bask in the tropical sun on a lounge chair on the terrace, catching up on reading or just taking in the views of the Andaman Sea in front of you.

The two curving halves of the villa are meant to represent hands of welcome, and the interiors continue this inviting, cocooning atmosphere in a modern way. The gallery-like living and dining room contains collections of Thai ceramics, photography and tapestry unlike anything you’ve seen before, all carefully assembled by designer Eggarat Wongcharit. Hanging sofas are novel yet comfortable, as are the jewelry-like gold and white dining chairs grouped around the glass-topped table. Other unique details include the words from sacred Buddhist texts and woven bamboo adorning the walls of the private spa room, designed to resemble the inside of a traditional Thai temple bell.

Each of the three bedrooms at Iniala Villa Siam is luxe enough to be a honeymoon suite, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and terrace. Beautiful woven bamboo work by the artist Korakot adds organic texture in one suite, while in another, a spray of bronze lotus flowers and leaves washes over the ceiling and walls.

Thanks to the oceanfront location of Iniala Villa Siam, it’s only steps from the villa to Natai Beach. You can also take a day trip to Mai Khao Beach, 24 km away, Nai Thon Beach, 37 km away, and Surin Beach, 47 km away. If you can tear yourself away from the pool and the beach, stroll over the Sa Phan Sarasin Bridge, spend a day at Sirinat National Park or FantaSea, explore Phuket or seek out memorable souvenirs at Central Festival Shopping Center. Revel in a moment of peace at Wat Chalong Temple or enjoy the famously bustling nightlife in Patong. At the end of your trip, take the complimentary airport transfer from Iniala Villa Siam to Phuket International Airport, 31 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Open-air architecture and a secluded location on the beach are a magical combination at Kirana Villa. Let your cares slip away on the breeze off the waters of Laem Sor at the contemporary living spaces—indoors and out—of this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental, while the staff takes care of the details. Six bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests in Bali-inspired style for a laid-back family reunion, relaxed holiday with friends or even an intimate oceanfront wedding and honeymoon.

Your stay at Kirana Villa includes daily continental breakfast and the services of a chef, property manager and security guard, freeing you to catch up on reading in a lounger on the terrace or watch the waves from the shaded sitting area on the terrace. There’s a smaller pool for children, a larger infinity pool where adults or older kids can do laps and an outdoor shower for rinsing off after sessions in the pool or the sea. Serve drinks from the indoor or outdoor bars while the barbecue heats up, then sit down to the al-fresco dining area and watch the sun set over the mainland during dinner.

Behind the villa’s imposing wooden entrance doors, a stunning open hallway leads to the great-room pavilion facing the water. There, several sets of sliding doors open to the children’s pool, and a spectacular fold-away glass wall opens to the terrace and sea views. An open-plan layout means that the casual sitting area, bistro-style dining table and fully equipped kitchen all share the bright, modern space.

By contrast, the six bedrooms at Kirana Villa are private havens. Each has an en-suite bathroom, an indulgent dressing or lounge area and its own balcony. Adults will love the five bedrooms with king beds, while kids will appreciate having their own room with two bunk beds. Like the common areas, however, the bedrooms use natural-fiber rugs, neutral tones, textured wooden accents and statement-making artwork for a chic look and organic feel.

From the villa’s location on the golden sands and shallow waters of Coco Beach, where you can swim, snorkel or explore via paddleboard or kayak, it’s less than 11 km to popular Lamai Beach and Nikki Beach and 32 km or less to the two nearest golf courses. Find shopping and dining on the town’s main street, 11 km away, or seek out adventure at Na Muang Safari Park or on a trek through the Koh Samui rainforest.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located among the lush jungle hills of Choeng Thale, this private villa offers seven en-suite king bedrooms, four swimming pools, incredible hillside views, and proximity to some of Phuket’s most celebrated attractions. Villa Jantra accommodates fourteen guests, and three of the bedrooms, located across the bridge, feature private entrances and their own private plunge pools. Within twenty kilometers, you’ll have access to shopping, golf, spa services, and plenty of Thailand’s beautiful beachfront areas.

Clean, modern architecture provides an exciting contrast to the lush foliage of Jantra’s jungle surroundings. Once inside, you’ll appreciate Jantra’s contemporary style. Sleek lines, designer furniture, and high-end electronics decorate the shared spaces. Wood and stone accent walls remind guests of the beauty outside. An open-air approach to Jantra’s floor plan ensures that indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly, in a way that delightfully blurs the line between inside and out. In the kitchen, your inner chef will be inspired by state of the art appliances, functional working areas, and the bright, social environment. And at dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace.

Outside, amongst the distant ocean views and lush jungle, you’re sure to be impressed with Jantra’s high level of privacy. There are plenty of great spots to work on your tan, as well as lots of shaded and covered areas to relax in a lounge chair. Jantra’s terrace also features a well-equipped outdoor kitchenette, furnished living area, and a refreshing infinity swimming pool.

The nearest beach to Villa Jantra is Layan, which is just a little over three-kilometers from home. Layan Beach is a favorite among locals and has somehow managed to elude the radar of most vacationers despite its crystal clear waters and beautiful white sand. Layan also features a beachfront restaurant, and Dream Beach Club is just a short walk along the coast. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Club is a favorite course among return visitors because of its challenging fairways and scenic views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
An incredible location on Natai Beach, pampering service and design inspired by Russian matryoshka dolls make Iniala Villa Bianca a truly unique retreat. Part of the exclusive Iniala Beach House resort, this Phuket vacation rental is fully staffed and totally private for an atmosphere of contemporary luxury. Share the beautiful, art-filled interiors and three bedrooms with friends or family, or use the whole villa as the setting for a decadent Thailand honeymoon.

Your holiday at Iniala Villa Bianca begins with an airport transfer and includes chef and meal service, a butler and driver and even sessions with a spa therapist in the house’s spa and massage room. Two curving halves of the villa, meant to represent hands welcoming guests to Iniala, are split to allow the infinity pool to run from an intimate al-fresco sitting area in the rear courtyard to the sun-drenched, yacht-inspired oceanfront deck in the front. There are lounge chairs for sunbathing, an outdoor shower for rinsing off, a barbecue for trying out local fare or old favorites and an al-fresco dining area where you can linger as the sun sets.

Interiors designed by A-cero from Spain and Philosophy of Design from Russia use a monochromatic white color scheme, natural textures, Asian art and the familiar shape of Russian nesting dolls to eclectic yet stunning effect. While walls of cool white and mirror-like glass feel polished and sleek, wood-paneled ceilings and floors are a warm, inviting counterpoint.

Each of the three bedrooms at Iniala Villa Bianca has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; two open to the terrace as well. In the two sea-view bedrooms, curving white panels cascade across the ceiling and form the headboard, creating the feeling of being ensconced in a seashell. The sculptural focal point is complemented by lush Thai silks and Indonesian artwork. In the third bedroom, the matryoshka shape makes another appearance in the form of a round bed tucked into a hollowed-out nook. Vibrant artwork by Hahan is a humorous touch that rewards a closer viewing.

At the start of your holiday, you can expect a 31 km drive from Phuket International Airport to Iniala Villa Bianca’s setting on Natai Beach in the Nai Thon area. Though there are several other must-see beaches within a short drive, there’s plenty more to do in the area, from crossing the Sa Phan Sarasin bridge and exploring Sirinat National Park and FantaSea to trying out local specialties in Phuket and finding the perfect souvenir at Central Festival Shopping Center. Take a moment to breathe at Wat Chalong Temple or visit Patong for breathtaking views and lively nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

This stunning, single-bedroom villa at Banyan Tree Phuket is perched directly on the resort's lagoon, within walking distance of Laguna Beach and the renowned Laguna Golf Phuket. The private, 1,300-square-meter estate features a fifteen-meter swimming pool on the main terrace and a beautiful wading pool surrounding the master suite pavilion. Its interiors combine classic Thai elegance with contemporary sensibility, including high-end appliances for dining and entertainment. Perfect for a couple on honeymoon or a romantic escape, this vacation rental offers superbly appointed privacy in one of Southeast Asia's most enchanting settings.

Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and trees, the terrace welcomes sumptuous relaxation under the clear skies of Phuket's west coast. The main swimming pool extends from the villa toward the lagoon, flanked by comfortable sunbeds. Returning from the beach after sunset, linger outdoors for alfresco meals and cocktails in the dreamy evening breeze.

A sliding glass wall infuses the interior great room with a veranda-like ambiance. This ample space features high, vaulted ceilings with a lovely chandelier and ceiling fans above the lounge area and dining table. The décor is exquisite throughout the home, with modern furnishings and sleek lines that feel at once contemporary and steeped in the age-old traditions of Thailand. Air conditioning ensures comfort in all seasons.

The master bedroom pavilion is set amid a sublime wading pool, inviting you to step from your bed in the morning into its soothing waters. Glass walls surround the suite on three sides, while shutters provide total privacy when needed. The large ensuite bathroom features a dual vanity, shower, and lovely soaking tub gazing out at the gardens.

The villa's fabulous location balances serenity with easy access to the world-class amenities at Banyan Tree Resort. You're a short walk from Laguna Beach, Bang Tao Beach, the fabulous Banyan Tree Spa, and Laguna Golf Phuket—recently redesigned by architect Paul Jansen and named "Asia's Best Golf Course" by World Golf Awards. The villa is also within easy reach of other top destinations on the island, including Naithon Beach and Royal Phuket Marina, while Phuket International Airport is an easy fifteen kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up with the sun at Baan Jakawan, a beautiful vacation rental set on the east coast of Koh Samui. You won’t want to miss a minute of the day at this luxury property near Chaweng, where a full staff is on hand to pamper you and the sea views stretch to the horizon. Spend a blissed-out holiday with up to fourteen friends or family members at this seven-bedroom retreat.

Look out over the bay from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and swim-up bar, a tempting row of loungers in the sun, and partially shaded living and dining areas. In the evenings, relax with the help of satellite television, a DVD player and internet access. Your stay even includes the services of a chef, concierge, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day.

At the heart of Baan Jakawan is a spacious open-plan great room whose graceful lines are inspired by traditional Thai architecture and whose fold-away glass walls showcase the views. Two sitting areas and a dining table in the center offer plenty of room for everyone to gather together.

The villa has four bedrooms with double beds, including the master suite, and three bedrooms with twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and many have resort-worthy features such as dressing areas, mini fridges or freestanding bathtubs.

While Baan Jakawan’s hillside location in the exclusive Narayan Heights neighborhood feels quiet and private, the villa is only a 6 km drive from Chaweng. Here, you’ll find one of the island’s best beaches, where you can relive your honeymoon with a stroll or bring the kids to splash around, and a town with plenty of options for shopping, dining and nightlife. At the beginning and end of your stay, a transfer is provided to the airport 8 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular villa enjoys a lofty coastal perch within walking distance of Kata Noi Beach on the southwest shore of Phuket, with panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Designed by Naga Concept Architects in a superb Southeast Asian style, the villa gracefully fuses interior and outdoor living areas and features resort-style, family-friendly amenities including a large swimming pool, high-end entertainment room, and games room. A three-bedroom main house and detached master suite offer spacious and comfortable accommodations for ten guests.

An exquisitely tiled infinite swimming pool forms the heart of the villa, its gem-toned surface meshing with the lush coastline and vast expanse of sea. The pool forms an L-shape around the dining pavilion, offering ample room to relax in the soothing water while gazing upon the horizon. A lovely table for eight is perched amid plentiful doors to the pool and sea-kissed breeze—a cool venue for alfresco meals. Extraordinary Buddhist artwork and detail inspire serene enjoyment of the present moment while rooting you in the rich history of coastal Thailand.

At the far end of the pool, an ample salon with retractable glass walls invites you to sip refreshments in the ocean air. Breathtaking antique doors lead into a second dining room with sublime vistas. The gourmet kitchen features high-grade appliances and generous prep areas for you or your private chef.

All four bedroom suites offer beautifully furnished havens for downtime and rest. The main house includes three bedrooms, each with a double bed, lounge, ocean-view balcony, and ensuite bathroom with rain shower and tub. The separate master suite opens directly to the pool terrace and features a lounge and ensuite bathroom with jetted tub, rain shower, and alfresco shower.

The villa is about 150 paces to Kata Noi Beach, renowned as one of the finest on the island. Less crowded than nearby Kata Beach, Kata Noi's calm waters make it a favorite among families with children. The villa is also within walking distance of tennis courts, a gym, and many shops and fine restaurants, including the Boathouse Wine & Grill. A host of activities and iconic attractions are within ten to twenty minutes by car, including the Big Buddha Temple, Red Mountain Golf Club, and Phuket town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Deny yourself nothing with a stay at Malliouhana - An Auberge Resort. Long a favorite of the Caribbean jet set, the resort was recently renovated, offering retro-chic interiors in a rainbow of pastel hues and floral prints. Luckily, some things haven’t changed, from its gorgeous location on the beaches of Meads Bay and Turtle Cove to its oversized rooms and tradition of pampering service.

Start each day at Malliouhana with a continental breakfast or coffee, then head to a yoga class on the pool terrace, the beach for sailing or snorkeling, or the tennis and basketball courts. Explore the property’s beautifully landscaped gardens via bicycle, or simply lounge on the patio—you don’t have any obligations until the resort’s afternoon tea.

Though the resort’s Moorish-inspired exteriors haven’t changed, the interiors are a gorgeous mix of retro style and British Colonial influences. Walls painted in shades of mint and buttercream are a delicious backdrop to candy-striped rugs, bold floral- or paisley-print upholstery and whimsical white resin furnishings that mimic the shapes of palms and bamboo. Of course, in addition to their chic side, the guestrooms have practical features like espresso machines, kettles, mini-bars and Wi-Fi.

The guestrooms at Malliouhana have two bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and television. Suites are available with one king bed and one queen bed or two king beds. Wide French doors lead from the bedrooms to balconies stocked with Adirondack chairs, tables and spa-style loungers, so you can watch the waves or step outside and feel the warm ocean breeze.

As you’d expect from a luxury resort, it’s just a few minutes’ walk from your room to the beaches at Turtle Cove, Meads Bay and Bobbing Cove. Ask the staff to arrange a tee time at Cuisinart Golf Course, a quick 3.2 km drive from the resort. There are two airports close to Malliouhana; the Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport is on Anguilla, 15 minutes away by car. You can also make the 10-minute drive to the Blowing Point ferry terminal, followed by a 25-minute ferry ride to St. Maarten and a 2-minute drive to Princess Juliana International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Capture the incredible sunrise at this hillside villa nestled between the ocean and the jungle on Koh Samui’s pristine east coast. Six ocean-view bedrooms look out from Punjabi Hill, giving every guest a fantastic vantage point. Slide open the balcony doors at dinner and invite the sea breeze to the party. Then, head out for drinks in Chaweng, the island’s bustling nightlife capital.

Sunny Moon Villa can’t help but promote nautical vibes. And why not? Subtle splashes of ocean-inspired turquoise can be found throughout, celebrating the gorgeous Gulf of Thailand. Acting like a canvas, pristine white walls convey a relaxing tone while providing a neutral background for a vibrant art collection. Warm wood tones and slate add a natural element to the interior, without distracting from the truly incomparable environment of Thailand. And, you’ll find plenty of time to soak up the sun beside the pool while the full-staff takes care of every detail.

Koh Samui has a neighborhood to match your vibe on any night, so get out and do some bar hopping. If you feel like dancing, downtown Chaweng is the spot. Rather sip tropical cocktails on a moonlit beach? Lamai has the beach club for you. If you’re in the mood for some authentic Thai cuisine in a historical setting, travel 9-km to Fisherman’s Village. In the afternoon, snap a few pictures at Big Buddha Temple after a guided hike through the jungle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

This stunning four-bedroom villa enjoys a prime perch within Layan Residences by Anantara, an exclusive residential community on the west coast of Phuket Island within Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. The two-story home features 1,817 square meters of exquisitely designed space, balancing contemporary style with vintage Thai influences. Superb features include an ample infinity swimming pool, an enchanting dining sala, and a roof deck with breathtaking, panoramic views of Layan Bay, the Andaman Sea, and the famous sunsets of Phuket. Layan Beach is just a short walk away, and guests additionally enjoy access to the resort's world-class amenities. Your vacation rental includes butler services as well as in-villa breakfast and airport transfer.

Nestled amid lush gardens, the expansive terrace with twenty-one-meter infinity pool offers a private setting to relish the company of family and friends. Step into the gem-toned water for a delicious dip, and revel in the sunlight on plentiful lounge chairs. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, gather for alfresco meals in the enchanting sala. Admire the sunset from the outdoor lounge or rooftop deck, and savor the evening amid enchanting torchlight.

Large glass walls open from the terrace to the villa's interiors, infusing the home with abundant natural light and delicious breezes. The living room features comfortable sofas, a TV, and a small dining table, while the separate dining room includes a circular, sea-view table for eight served by an open, fully equipped kitchen. Simple yet exquisite décor evokes the timeless spirit of Thailand while accentuating the serenity of the present moment.

All four bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. The master suite includes a king bed, a private lounge area, a walk-in closet, and a jetted tub in its deluxe bathroom. There is one guest suite with a king bed, one with a queen, and one with two queen beds.

Beyond your private villa, you're within easy reach of the resort's outstanding offerings, including restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, parlor games, yoga, Pilates, a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. The resort also includes a chapel, while proximity to Phuket International Airport ensures convenience for families and destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Plan a holiday unlike any other at the Layan Residences by Anantara - 5-Bedroom Seaview Residence. One of fifteen beautifully designed luxury villas adjoining the Anantara Layan Phuket Resort, this expansive vacation rental is a private retreat that still gives you access to resort amenities. Book a relaxed stay with the extended family or reserve the property for a tropical getaway with up to twelve friends.

Guests of the Seaview Residence enjoy a complimentary airport transfer, daily breakfast in the villa and butler service. If the pampering doesn’t help you relax, the outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining area, all overlooking the sea, certainly will. The villa also features its own spa, exercise room, TV, Wi-Fi, and indoor and outdoor sound systems.

Even when you’re inside, floor-to-ceiling windows frame the dramatic views of mountains, beach and sea. The open-concept living areas are sleek yet inviting, with thoughtful details such as built-in bookshelves and subtly paneled walls stretching to the high ceilings. Warm wood tones link the living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen.

The Seaview Residence has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two double beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, TVs and air conditioning, and several have additional features such as walk-in closets and desk areas.

Your stay at the residence also includes access to the pool, tennis court and kids club at the nearby Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. Try out water sports using the resort’s equipment, indulge in a spa treatment or join couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner in one of the restaurants. The villa’s location in the Thalang area is also just a 1-minute walk from Layan Beach and a short drive from a beach club, spa and golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located within the Sri Panwa Resort, on a private peninsula, Villa Baan Chirawan is an ideal host for a large group getaway. With seven luxurious bedrooms and spacious indoor/outdoor hosting areas that capture ocean views on both sides of the peninsula, you’ll be able to enjoy the sunrise and sunset. Nearby, you’ll have quick and easy access to the many attractions of downtown Phuket, golf, and plenty of gorgeous beachfront.

Villa Baan Chirawan’s open concept living room has more than enough space, and seating, for your whole group to gather as one. For more intimate moments, you’ll find several smaller sitting areas, both inside and out. The soothing cream tones of the interior are sure to promote a relaxing atmosphere, especially when the terrace doors are open and the fresh sea breeze is cooling the villa.

From Baan Chirawan’s scenic terrace, you’ll enjoy an endless view of the Andaman Sea, as well as some of Phuket’s neighboring islands. With an infinity pool, a hot tub, alfresco dining, and an outdoor kitchen, there’s no need to go inside at all. Actually, there are plenty. Baan Chirawan’s interior is full of interesting art. Floor-to-ceiling glass frames amazing ocean views, and when the doors are open, the inside and out become one incredible hosting area. And, all seven bedrooms are king en-suites. During your stay, you’ll have the help of a housekeeper, security guard, airport transfer service, and you’ll have access to the resort priveledges at Sri Panwa.

The nearest beach to Baan Chirawan is Ao Yon, at just three kilometers. If you’re traveling with kids, or the young at heart, Phuket’s aquarium and zoo are both great afternoon excursions. If you’d like to immerse yourself in the local culture and history, plan a trip to Chalong Temple. And, for shopping, dining, and nightlife, it’s only eleven kilometers to Phuket Town’s downtown core. If there’s a golf aficionado in the group, they may want to consider booking a round at Blue Canyon Golf Club, about forty minutes north. The Canyon Course has been host to some of the PGA’s most memorable moments, with nail-biting playoff wins by Tiger Woods and Greg Norman.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on the hillside of Phuket's Kamala Bay, with panoramic views overlooking its beach and the Andaman Sea, Villa Nevaeh's vantage point can't be beaten. You and your guests will instantly fall in love with Nevaeh's open-air design, and six en-suite, ocean view bedrooms, each one housed in its own private sleeping pavilion. The added privacy makes this villa perfect for couples or groups of friends on vacation together. Within a few kilometers of Nevaeh, you'll find the town of Phuket, incredible golf courses, and lots of sandy beachfront.

With a contemporary spin on traditional Thai architecture, Nevaeh's designers have created an authentic homage to Thailand's unique style, while adding state of the art upgrades to maximize its luxurious features. Numerous openings to the terrace, rich wood tones, and an elegant white color scheme give Nevaeh's interior a breezy beach house vibe that is warm, inviting, and fun, while remaining more than suitable for formal occasions. The true beauty of this spacious getaway is its integration into the natural surroundings. With an amazing ocean view, gorgeous climate, and a free-flowing atmosphere, you'll be happy to ignore the line between inside and out.

At dinner, Nevaeh comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal and alfresco dining areas, and a private chef. Butler service and housekeeping are included as well. On the terrace, you'll love the infinity pool, living areas, and sun beds. Back inside, Nevaeh's unique features include an entertainment lounge, fitness room, office, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi.

The closest beach area to Nevaeh is Kamala Beach, of which you'll have a great view from the terrace. Travel just a few minutes further, and you'll find Surin, Patong, and Nai Thon Beach. If it's golf you're after, Phuket has five amazing courses within twenty-kilometers of Nevaeh, all with dynamic scenery and unique characteristics. If you're traveling with children, Fantasea Phuket Theme Park is great for an afternoon outing. And, the town of Phuket offers high-end shopping, adventure tourism opportunities, and vibrant nightlife.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Ayundra is an idyllic beachside retreat located on Koh Samui’s unspoiled west coast in Lipa Noi. On one of the island’s most secluded beaches, Villa Ayundra  has been designed to offer guests all the comforts and pleasures of contemporary living along the natural oceanfront setting that personifies this Thai island’s unique appeal. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

This stunning vacation rental looks out to an untroubled bay over a grassy lawn, and steps lead straight to the beach. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the long infinity-edge swimming pool. It’s both perfect for laps and laughs – with the swim-up wet bar. An intelligent use of outdoor space makes island life a pleasure, whether lounging in comfort, dining alfresco in one of the open-sided salas while piping tunes on the outdoor sound system. Interior perks include a wine fridge, an espresso machine, cable television and Wi-Fi. The villa also features an exercise room and baby equipment. The professional staff will take care of the details. Ask about the special meals prepared by a private chef!

This secure, walled property features a modern, Thai-influenced design combining natural materials and shingle roofs with the best in contemporary finishes and high-end amenities. Outside, the villa is framed in tropical flora, while inside, the open interiors are beautifully complemented by a fine collection of Asian art and artifacts. With its chic and elegant pavilions, this luxury beachfront villa offers a convenient layout. The innovative, open-walled rooms allow you to wander barefoot between the bedrooms and living areas with ease, while surrounded by sparkling ocean views.

Five exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. Each suite offers a king size bed, television, ceiling fan and direct outdoor access. Two suites provide dual vanities, and one includes a rain shower. Villa Ayundra  makes a great bet for a family or a special event such as a wedding or birthday.

Despite its secluded location, the villa’s sophisticated interiors and entertainment systems mean a carefree holiday. A range of island attractions and golf courses are also within easy reach of Villa Ayundra . Enjoy the spectacular tropical sunsets that are so famous in the southern Thai islands while enjoying your favorite cocktail – have your vacation, your way!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Skyfall is an exquisite luxury villa on the island of Koh Samui in Thailand. Located in Plai Laem, the hillside home is just minutes from Choeng Mon Beach and enjoys spectacular views of the Gulf of Thailand and Koh Phangnan Island. Superb staff and services include a chef, manager, and 24-hour security. Extraordinary living and dining spaces, including eight superb bedroom suites accommodating sixteen, create the perfect setting for unforgettable family reunions or gatherings of friends in one of the most enchanting destinations in Southeast Asia.

The  four-level villa features multiple terraces and balconies with outstanding ocean views. The beautiful infinite swimming pool includes a bar and a tanning shelf where you can luxuriate on elegant loungers in the South Pacific sun. Relish alfresco meals prepared by your private chef and linger outside at sunset and at night, sipping delicious cocktails under the sublime sky.

Gorgeous glass doors open on both levels of the villa, inviting ocean air and light into the home. The spacious living room gazes out on the pool and sea. Step down into a sumptuous cocktail lounge, likewise with lovely views, and gather in the extraordinary dining room with its table for twelve. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. At night, gather in the superb lounge with full bar, stylish seating, and a pool table, or watch your favorite movies in the excellent home theater.

Each of the bedroom suites is like luxury apartment unto itself, with ensuite bathroom and outstanding furnishings and amenities. All but three of the suites open directly to the terrace or balcony, and each includes a lounge area, desk, and safe. The spectacular master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ocean views.

Villa Skyfall provides a fabulous balance of sumptuous privacy and outstanding access to the many splendors of Koh Samui. You're just three minutes to Choeng Mon Beach and seven to Naturism Beach, while world-class golf is an easy drive away at Santiburi and Royal Samui. The famous Wat Plai Laem is just four kilometers down the road. The airport is also just five kilometers away, making Villa Skyfall a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perfect for vacationers who appreciate privacy, this sleek and stylish four bedroom is close enough to the action, yet tucked away amongst lush tropical greenery and mature palm trees. Located in the Thalang District of Phuket, Villa 61 puts you within a short drive of some of the island’s most coveted attractions. You’ll find World-class golf, Thailand’s largest water park, Thalang Museum, and numerous historical sites surrounding Villa 61’s beautiful property. And, Villa 61 comes with a complimentary shuttle service to one of Phuket’s best beachfront destinations, Dream Beach Club on Layan Beach.

Villa 61’s classic black and white palette is the perfect contrast to the vibrant colors of Thailand’s gorgeous environment. Inside, you’ll appreciate the social atmosphere created by the villa’s open concept layout and wide openings to the terrace. State of the art electronics and appliances can be found throughout, as well as modern contemporary furniture, and eclectic works of art.

Start your day with complimentary breakfast at The Plantation Restaurant. Later, enjoy afternoon tea service, before you shuttle over to beautiful Layan Beach. For dinner, Villa 61’s fully equipped kitchen, barbecue, formal dining area, and alfresco set on the terrace will provide multiple options and inspiration. Also on the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity pool, lounging in sun chairs, and relaxing under the shade of the gazebo on the lawn.

Although it’s one of Phuket’s most popular beaches, Layan manages to keep a fairly low-profile in certain parts of its sandy stretch. On one end, Dream Beach Club is the place to be if you’re looking for fun in the sun, or after dark. If you’d prefer somewhere quiet and less populated to relax under a palm tree or work on your tan, the northern end of Layan is where you should lay your beach towel. If there’s a golfer in the group, the southern parts of Phuket are rich with amazing courses, like Blue Canyon, Laguna, and Loch Palm golf clubs, to name a few.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Architecturally stunning, the Chaweng Peak Villas are a pair of four bedroom luxury rentals located on the same lush plot of land along Chaweng Noi’s scenic hillside. With the combined amenities of Villa Moon Shadow and Karpe Diem, Chaweng Peak can accommodate up to sixteen guests, making this the perfect setting for a special group event. Easily one of Koh Samui’s most prestigious homes, Chaweng Peak includes three swimming pools, panoramic ocean views, and an open-air environment that is sure to sooth the soul.

Drawing inspiration from its natural surroundings, Chaweng Peak’s architects used eco-friendly design and state of the art technical features to create a modern luxury villa that seamlessly integrates into Thailand’s beautiful environment. Decorated with intriguing works of art, designer furniture, and wide openings to the balcony, it’s obvious that every inch of this villa was thoughtfully crafted. Spacious dining areas and lounges make it easy to host group gatherings, while smaller settings like the pool’s swim-up bar, games room, and hot tub are great for more intimate affairs.

During your stay, you’ll benefit from the help of a villa manager, housekeeper, in-house staff, and private chef. Each villa is fully air-conditioned and comes with Wi-Fi, satellite television, and sound systems. The Karpe Diem villa also has an exercise room and spa. And, most of the eight bedrooms have ensuites, outdoor areas, and ocean views.

WIthin ten kilometers of home, you’ll find the sandy shores of Chaweng, Lamai, and Bophut beaches. Four minutes away, one of Thailand’s best golf courses awaits at the Royal Samui Golf and Country Club. For some local history, Big Buddha Temple is a must-see. And, for delicious cuisine and exciting nightlife, the Nathon Night market is the place to be.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that these rates are dynamic. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialist for the best available rate.  

This three-bedroom villa on the west coast of Phuket is situated within Layan Residences by Anantara, an extraordinary luxury community within the Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. Just a short walk from the beach, the two-story home enjoys a lofty position on the lush hillside overlooking Layan Bay and the Andaman Sea. Its expansive pool terrace, rooftop decks, and luminous interiors offer an exquisite balance of contemporary style and classic Thai character, enhanced by high-end technologies and butler services. Superb accommodations for six make this villa an excellent choice for families and destination wedding guests.

An infinity swimming pool (twenty-one meters in length) stretches the length of the terrace, its gem-toned surface meshing with the vast panorama of verdant coastline and azure sea. Dip into its refreshing waters and savor the sunlight on plentiful lounge chairs oriented toward the horizon. Stroll to Layan Beach and return to alfresco meals in the beautiful sala. Admire the sublime sunset from this privileged vantage, and celebrate under the stars amid enchanting torch light.

Large glass doors infuse the interiors with abundant a dreamy luminescence and sea-kissed air. The main salon features a comfortable TV lounge and a small table, while the dining room houses a circular table with sweeping views, served by an open kitchen with gourmet appliances. Natural wood accents, soft tones, and choice touches of local artistry and heritage create a serene and inspiring ambiance. The villa is air-conditioned and includes an office and Bose surround sound.

The villa features two deluxe king suites as well as smaller suite with two twin beds. All three rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, high-end TVs, and air conditioning. Both the master suite and the guest king suite include private lounges, walk-in closets, desks, and deluxe bathrooms with jetted tubs.

The villa's position balances privacy with easy access to the resort's fabulous offerings, including restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, parlor games, yoga, Pilates, a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. Dream Beach Club is just two kilometers away, and you're an easy drive to Banyan Tree Spa, the Laguna Phuket Golf Club, and Banana Beach. Your vacation rental includes complimentary transfer to nearby Phuket International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself away to the quieter side of Koh Samui at the stunning Villa Kasalong. Nestled into a lush hillside in the Taling Ngam area, this stylish vacation rental commands some of the best views on the island: verdant treetops, turquoise waters and distant hills. It’s a gorgeous setting for a family reunion, a tropical holiday with friends or even an intimate destination wedding.

Your stay at Villa Kasalong includes daily breakfast, housekeeping service and the use of a seven-passenger SUV. Soak in the sun from a broad terrace with an infinity pool and plenty of loungers, or unwind in the shaded al-fresco living and dining areas. In the evenings, a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi are waiting to entertain.

Open-concept living areas with fold-back glass walls let you enjoy the 180-degree views of Koh Samui even while you’re indoors. The tiled floors are carried over from the terrace for a seamless indoor-outdoor feel, and an eclectic mix of vintage and modern pieces lends a relaxed appeal to the living and dining areas. A separate kitchen is fully equipped and has a long breakfast bar as well.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and four bedrooms with queen beds. All six bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have ocean views. As in the great room, you’ll find an expert pairing of sleek modern pieces and traditional kilim rugs in the bedrooms.

The provided SUV makes it easy to explore the island, whether you’re admiring Laem Sor Pagoda, 6 minutes away by car, or driving to the pier, 10 minutes away, to wander nearby shops and restaurants. There are three beaches within a 20-minute drive of Villa Kasalong, where you can join honeymooners and families alike in the warm waters.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exceptional villa is located within Layan Residences by Anantara, a luxury resort community on the west coast of Phuket Island. Blending traditional Thai style with a contemporary sensibility and high-end comforts, the 2,600-square-meter home features an impressive array of private amenities, including a twenty-one-meter infinity swimming pool, alfresco dining sala, in-villa spa with hot tub, and rooftop deck with panoramic views. Additionally, the villa is a short walk from the beach and within easy reach of the resort’s world-class offerings. A superb private staff will elevate your experience with attentive service and delicious meals. Seven bedroom suites accommodate families, business travelers, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.

The villa’s stunning design harmonizes with the landscape and sea, inviting you to long days and evenings in the open air. Dip into the expansive swimming pool and bask in the sunlight on ample outdoor beds. Dine alfresco in the gorgeous sala with sweeping views, and marvel at the sunset from the lofty roof terrace. At night, linger outdoors amid the enchanting torchlight, savoring wine or cocktails under the canopy of stars.

The interior living areas breathe the sea-kissed air through large glass doors. Soft tones, natural wood accents, and beautiful touches of traditional artistry create a serene and inspiring ambiance. Relax in the tranquil living room with ample sectional sofa and large TV, and gather for privately catered meals in the dining room. Cuddle up with a favorite movie in the home cinema, and start your morning with a workout in your private gym.

There are two master suites, each with a king bed, walk-in closet, and deluxe bathroom with rain shower and tub. Four of the guest suites feature king beds, while the other has a pair of twin beds—perfect for younger guests. Each suite features an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and TV, and there are lovely desks in the king rooms.

Beyond this secluded haven, the resort features fine restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, tennis, and Anantara Spa, as well as a chapel and event spaces for weddings and special ceremonies. Banyan Tree Spa and Laguna Phuket Golf Club are both a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Elevate your Phuket holiday at Villa Aye. Perched on a hillside overlooking the sea, with steeples and pavilions reminiscent of a Buddhist temple, this luxury vacation rental is a tranquil sanctuary for up to sixteen friends or family members. Let the attentive staff take care of your needs as you celebrate a milestone birthday or anniversary, host an intimate destination wedding or simply relax.

Your stay at Villa Aye includes the services of a chef, property manager and housekeeper, as well as villa security around the clock. Watch the sunrise from one of the east-facing outdoor living areas, then revel in the panoramic views from the loungers on the sunny terrace or the wide infinity pool. Other amenities include a barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight, indoor and outdoor sound systems, fitness and yoga rooms, and entertaining areas with a bar and pool table.

Inside the villa, details like vaulted ceilings, an open-concept layout and fold-away glass walls create a breezy ambience and maximize the stunning views. Clean-lined furnishings and a low-profile, Japanese-inspired dining table mean there’s nothing to interrupt the scenery, and a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine and wine fridge makes it easy to start and end the day on the right note.

Each of the eight bedrooms at Villa Aye is a private retreat with an en-suite bathroom; many have a lounge area and a terrace or balcony as well. There are seven bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite, and one bedroom with two twin beds.

A stay at Villa Aye puts you close to some of Phuket’s best beaches and top attractions. The tucked-away cove of Yae Beach is only a 2-minute drive away; go a little farther and you’ll be at the more popular Kamala and Surin beaches. Book a round or a treatment at the nearby Laguna Phuket Golf Club and Banyan Tree Spa, or make the 20-minute drive into town for shopping, dining and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
